wikipedia_page.main: Giles Kevin Stille (born 10 November 1958) is an English former  professional footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League for Brighton & Hove Albion. He went on to coach and manage in Sweden. He is the current manager of Swedish Division 1 side Assyriska.

response: *  Giles Stille 吉尔斯·斯蒂尔 3 March 2019–
